testcase.name: demonstrateAlertHelpSystem
testcase.system-out:
[INFO] DynamoDB table 'customers' already exists
============================================================ 🚨 ALERTS FEATURE LIVE DEMO 🚨 ============================================================ [ERROR] Registration failed! Email might already be registered. [SUCCESS] Login successful! Welcome back, Demo User! ✅ Demo user logged in successfully!
📚 ALERT HELP SYSTEM DEMO ============================================== 📖 Alert Help Content:
=== Device Alerts Help === Alerts notify you when specific conditions are met.
ALERT TYPES: 1. Time-Based Alerts: - Trigger at specific date/time - Example: Remind to turn off AC at 11 PM - Format: DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM
2. Energy Usage Alerts: - Trigger when energy consumption meets threshold - Example: Alert when TV uses more than 5 kWh - Comparison types: Greater than, Less than, Equals
IMPORTANT NOTES: - Alerts are notifications only - No automatic device actions are taken - You decide what action to take when alerted - Alerts can be activated/deactivated anytime
💡 PRACTICAL EXAMPLES: 1. ⏰ Time Alert: 'Turn off AC at 11 PM' → Device: AC in Master Bedroom → Time: 23:00 daily → Action: Just notifies, you decide what to do
2. ⚡ Energy Alert: 'High TV usage warning' → Device: TV in Living Room → Threshold: > 5.0 kWh → Action: Alert when TV uses too much energy
✅ Help system is fully functional! [SUCCESS] Logged out successfully from account: demo@smarthome.com [INFO] You can now register a new account or login with different credentials.
